lead_paragraph: A United Nations official who visited North Dakota in the wake of months of protests over the Dakota Access pipeline believes the concerns and rights of Native Americans haven't been adequately addressed.
snippet: A United Nations official who visited North Dakota in the wake of months of protests over the Dakota Access pipeline believes the concerns and rights of Native Americans haven't been adequately addressed....

headline.print_headline: After Kansas Shooting, a Community in Fear
headline.main: After Kansas Shooting, a Community in Fear
